column5: The course is designed for students who wish to supplement their education in a specific set of advanced topics and cutting-edge technologies that they require for their professional lives, or to pursue their studies further to a PhD on a specific topic. It offers a broad menu of modules from which you can construct your own pathway with the advice and assistance of a member of staff. The PGDip includes the same modules as the MSc but without the final project. column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
